header.title: This table is used to define the internal accounts which will be used for the ACH payments. The same internal accounts should be used while designing the product conditions for Settlement activity for ACH. Company ID is the valid @ ID. Can be set up for each company

ovdesc.p: This local table contains the ACH Account details.

desc.p: This field is used to indicate the Internal account number used for PAYIN activity. Should contain valid Internal account numbers in T24.
This field is used to indicate the Internal account number used for PAOUT activity. Should contain valid Internal account numbers in T24
This field is used to indicate the default ACH Clearing account to be used throughout the bank. Should contain valid Internal account numbers in T24
This field is used to indicate the default ACH Return account to be used throughout the bank in case of return/ rejected ACH files. Should contain valid Internal account numbers in T24
This field denotes the ACH class type of file which is generated as a part of flat file. For ACH payments for Deposits and Loan, it is usually PPD
This field is used to denote the version which is invoked while raising the FT which corresponds to the ACH. Valid list of versions in T24 can be added
